name: BlockBuster·
description:
Add blocks to the board. Make lines from one end to the other to score.

Horizontal lines and vertical lines both count.

Pro tip: Clear lines as soon as possible to keep the board clear. Make sure you always have
space on the board for all possible tiles!

Features of Wood Puzzle:
Save your high score!
Keep your progress even if you close the app!
Play without wifi!
Play unlimited games!
No timers or lives!

Play Wood Puzzle every day for brain training!
